languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, похоже, Кунрад каким-то образом обзавелся копией... или даже оригиналом вашей визы! Наличие подобного документа у предателя не сулит ничего хорошего!"

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, похоже, Кунрад каким-то образом обзавелся копией... или даже оригиналом вашей визы! Наличие подобного документа у предателя не сулит ничего хорошего!"

languages.text: "Lord Captain, it would seem that Kunrad somehow got his hands on a copy of your authorisation — or perhaps even the original! A tool like that in the hands of a traitor does not bode well!"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, похоже, Кунрад каким-то образом обзавелся копией... или даже оригиналом вашей визы! Наличие подобного документа у предателя не сулит ничего хорошего!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, it would seem that Kunrad somehow got his hands on a copy of your authorization — or even the original document! A tool like that in the hands of a traitor does not bode well!"
"Lord Captain, it would seem that Kunrad somehow got his hands on a copy of your authorization — or even the original document! A tool like that in the hands of a traitor does not bode well!"
"Lord Captain, it would seem that Kunrad somehow got his hands on a copy of your authorisation — or perhaps even the original! A tool like that in the hands of a traitor does not bode well!"
"Lord Captain, it would seem that Kunrad somehow got his hands on a copy of your authorisation — or perhaps even the original! A tool like that in the hands of a traitor does not bode well!"
"Lord Captain, it would seem that Kunrad somehow got his hands on a copy of your authorisation — or perhaps even the original! A tool like that in the hands of a traitor does not bode well!"

languages.text: “舰长大人，看来昆拉德以某种方式弄到了您的授权书的副本，甚至可能是原件！像这样的东西，落在了那个叛徒手中，这可不是什么好兆头！”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, it would seem that Kunrad somehow got his hands on a copy of your authorisation — or perhaps even the original! A tool like that in the hands of a traitor does not bode well!"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，看来昆拉德以某种方式弄到了您的授权书的副本，甚至可能是原件！像这样的东西，落在了那个叛徒手中，这可不是什么好兆头！”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, parece que Kunrad se ha hecho con una copia de su autorización, ¡posiblemente con el original! ¡Una herramienta así en manos de un traidor es algo espantoso!».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, it would seem that Kunrad somehow got his hands on a copy of your authorisation — or perhaps even the original! A tool like that in the hands of a traitor does not bode well!"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, parece que Kunrad se ha hecho con una copia de su autorización, ¡posiblemente con el original! ¡Una herramienta así en manos de un traidor es algo espantoso!».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン様、クンラッドは御身の許可証のコピー、いえ、もしかしたら原本を手に入れてたようです！あのようなものが裏切り者の手に渡っては、どのような事態を招くことになるかわかりません！」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, it would seem that Kunrad somehow got his hands on a copy of your authorisation — or perhaps even the original! A tool like that in the hands of a traitor does not bode well!"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン様、クンラッドは御身の許可証のコピー、いえ、もしかしたら原本を手に入れてたようです！あのようなものが裏切り者の手に渡っては、どのような事態を招くことになるかわかりません！」

languages.text: "Lord Captain, anscheinend hat Kunrad irgendwie eine Kopie Eurer Autorisierung in die Finger bekommen – oder vielleicht sogar das Original! So etwas in den Händen eines Verräters verheißt nichts Gutes!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, it would seem that Kunrad somehow got his hands on a copy of your authorisation — or perhaps even the original! A tool like that in the hands of a traitor does not bode well!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, anscheinend hat Kunrad irgendwie eine Kopie Eurer Autorisierung in die Finger bekommen – oder vielleicht sogar das Original! So etwas in den Händen eines Verräters verheißt nichts Gutes!"

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, il semblerait que Kunrad ait mis la main sur une copie de votre autorisation... ou même l'original, qui sait ! Je n'ose imaginer ce qu'un traître pourrait accomplir avec un tel instrument ! »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, it would seem that Kunrad somehow got his hands on a copy of your authorisation — or perhaps even the original! A tool like that in the hands of a traitor does not bode well!"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, il semblerait que Kunrad ait mis la main sur une copie de votre autorisation... ou même l'original, qui sait ! Je n'ose imaginer ce qu'un traître pourrait accomplir avec un tel instrument ! »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, sanıyorum Kunrad yetki aracınızın bir kopyasını bir şekilde eline geçirmeyi başarmış. Hatta elindeki orijinali bile olabilir! Bir hainin böylesi bir güce sahip olması hiç iyiye alamet değil!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, it would seem that Kunrad somehow got his hands on a copy of your authorisation — or perhaps even the original! A tool like that in the hands of a traitor does not bode well!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, sanıyorum Kunrad bir şekilde yetkinizin bir kopyasını eline geçirmeyi başarmış. Belki de orijinalini ele geçirmiştir! Bir hainin böylesi bir güce sahip olması hiç iyiye alamet değil!"
